rules.name: Rule of Thirds
rules.description: Subject should be placed at intersection points of a 3x3 grid
rules.condition: subject_position NOT in center AND subject_position NEAR intersection
rules.snippet: camera positioned to frame subject at rule of thirds intersection, creating dynamic visual balance

rules.name: Leading Lines
rules.description: Use natural or artificial lines to guide viewer's eye toward subject
rules.snippet: strong leading lines drawing the eye directly to the subject, creating depth and focus
examples: road lines leading to distant figure

rules.name: Pan Following
rules.description: Horizontal camera movement following subject motion
rules.snippet: smooth horizontal pan tracking the subject's movement across the scene

rules.name: Tilt Reveal
rules.description: Vertical camera movement revealing information
rules.snippet: dramatic tilt up revealing the full scale and majesty of the scene
examples: tilt up from feet to reveal towering building
tilt down from sky to reveal subject

rules.name: Dolly Push
rules.description: Camera moves physically closer to subject for intimacy
rules.snippet: slow dolly push creating intimate connection with subject
examples: dolly in on character's emotional moment
push in to reveal important detail

rules.name: Dolly Pull
rules.description: Camera moves away to reveal context or isolation
rules.snippet: gradual dolly pull revealing the subject's isolation within the vast environment
examples: pull back to show character alone in space

rules.name: Crane Shot
rules.description: Elevated camera movement for bird's-eye or establishing views
rules.snippet: sweeping crane shot rising above to provide majestic aerial perspective

rules.name: Handheld Movement
rules.description: Intentional camera shake for realism or tension
rules.snippet: subtle handheld movement adding raw authenticity and tension to the scene

rules.name: Steadicam Flow
rules.description: Smooth floating camera movement following complex paths
rules.snippet: fluid steadicam movement gliding through the environment with cinematic grace

rules.name: Zoom In
rules.description: Lens zoom for emphasis or discovery
rules.snippet: slow zoom in drawing attention to crucial emotional detail

rules.name: Zoom Out
rules.description: Lens zoom revealing broader context
rules.snippet: gradual zoom out revealing the subject's place within the larger world

rules.name: Arc Shot
rules.description: Circular movement around subject for 360° perspective
rules.snippet: circular arc movement orbiting the subject to reveal their complete environment

rules.name: Rack Focus
rules.description: Shifting focus between foreground and background
rules.snippet: precise rack focus shifting attention between foreground and background elements
examples: focus shift from face to background

rules.name: Shallow Depth
rules.description: Selective focus isolating subject from background
rules.snippet: beautiful shallow depth of field isolating the subject with creamy bokeh background

rules.name: Deep Focus
rules.description: Everything in focus for complex staging
rules.snippet: deep focus keeping all planes sharp for intricate staging and layered composition

rules.name: Golden Hour Lighting
rules.description: Warm, directional light during sunrise/sunset
rules.snippet: golden hour magic with warm, directional light creating long shadows and rich color

rules.name: Backlighting
rules.description: Light from behind subject creating rim light and silhouettes
rules.snippet: dramatic backlighting creating luminous rim light around subject edges

rules.name: Side Lighting
rules.description: Light from side creating depth and texture
rules.snippet: moody side lighting sculpting form and revealing texture with dramatic shadows

rules.name: Hard Light
rules.description: Sharp, defined shadows for dramatic effect
rules.snippet: piercing hard light creating sharp, defined shadows for dramatic impact

rules.name: Soft Light
rules.description: Diffused light with gentle shadows
rules.snippet: beautiful soft diffused light wrapping the subject with gentle, flattering shadows

rules.name: Lens Flare
rules.description: Light artifacts from lens for atmosphere
rules.snippet: organic lens flare adding cinematic atmosphere and visual interest

rules.name: Film Grain
rules.description: Textured grain for vintage film look
rules.snippet: subtle film grain texture adding authentic cinematic character

rules.name: Vignetting
rules.description: Darkened edges focusing attention center
rules.snippet: gentle vignetting naturally drawing focus to the center of the frame

rules.name: Motion Blur
rules.description: Blur from camera or subject movement
rules.snippet: dynamic motion blur conveying speed and movement energy

rules.name: Bokeh Effects
rules.description: Aesthetic blur in out-of-focus areas
rules.snippet: beautiful bokeh circles creating dreamy, cinematic background

rules.name: Symmetrical Composition
rules.description: Balanced, mirror-like composition
rules.snippet: perfectly symmetrical composition creating formal, powerful visual impact

rules.name: Asymmetrical Balance
rules.description: Dynamic balance through visual weight distribution
rules.snippet: dynamic asymmetrical balance creating tension and visual interest

rules.name: Framing Within Frame
rules.description: Use foreground elements to frame subject
rules.snippet: clever framing within frame using foreground elements to focus attention

rules.name: Negative Space
rules.description: Empty space emphasizing subject through isolation
rules.snippet: powerful use of negative space emphasizing the subject through isolation

rules.name: Diagonal Lines
rules.description: Dynamic diagonal elements creating energy
rules.snippet: dynamic diagonal lines injecting energy and movement into the frame

rules.name: S-Curve
rules.description: Gentle S-shaped leading line
rules.snippet: elegant S-curve leading the eye gracefully through the composition

rules.name: Z-Axis Movement
rules.description: Movement toward or away from camera
rules.snippet: compelling movement along Z-axis creating depth and spatial dynamics

rules.name: Tracking Shot
rules.description: Camera follows subject maintaining consistent distance
rules.snippet: smooth tracking shot maintaining perfect distance while following subject movement

rules.name: Push In
rules.description: Camera moves closer for emotional emphasis
rules.snippet: intimate push in emphasizing the emotional weight of the moment

rules.name: Pull Back
rules.description: Camera pulls back revealing broader context
rules.snippet: dramatic pull back revealing the full scope and context of the situation
examples: pull back to show entire scene

rules.name: Over-the-Shoulder
rules.description: Shot from behind subject looking at subject of interest
rules.snippet: intimate over-the-shoulder shot creating connection between viewer and subject

rules.name: Low Angle
rules.description: Camera positioned low looking up for power dynamic
rules.snippet: low angle shot making the subject appear powerful and dominant

rules.name: High Angle
rules.description: Camera positioned high looking down for vulnerability
rules.snippet: high angle shot emphasizing the subject's vulnerability or isolation

rules.name: Dutch Angle
rules.description: Tilted camera for unease or tension
rules.snippet: subtle Dutch angle creating psychological tension and unease

rules.name: Silhouette
rules.description: Subject as dark shape against bright background
rules.snippet: dramatic silhouette reducing subject to essential shape and form

rules.name: Chiaroscuro
rules.description: Strong contrast between light and dark
rules.snippet: dramatic chiaroscuro lighting with bold contrast between light and shadow

rules.name: Practical Lighting
rules.description: Visible light sources within scene
rules.snippet: motivated practical lighting from visible sources within the scene

rules.name: Color Temperature
rules.description: Warm vs cool color temperature for mood
rules.snippet: carefully balanced color temperature creating specific emotional atmosphere

rules.name: Edge Light
rules.description: Light separating subject from background
rules.snippet: subtle edge light perfectly separating subject from background

rules.name: Fill Light
rules.description: Soft light reducing harsh shadows
rules.snippet: gentle fill light softening shadows while maintaining natural contrast

rules.name: Motivated Camera Movement
rules.description: Camera movement driven by story or emotion
rules.snippet: emotionally motivated camera movement serving the story and character journey

rules.name: Character-Driven Movement
rules.description: Camera movement reflecting character psychology
rules.snippet: character-driven camera movement reflecting internal psychological state
